Sequence Information.Peptide Name: HaNP-4 (natural AMPs; alpha, UCSS1a; 3S=S; hamster neutrophil defensin 4, rodents, mammals, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  It contains three disulfide bonds: 3,31; 5,20; 10,30.Activity: Active against S. aureus (IC50 6.5 ug/ml), S. pyogenes (IC50 5.9 ug/ml), E. faecalis (IC50 9.2 ug/ml), E. coli (IC50 11.8 ug/ml), Salmonella serotype krefeld (IC50 9.8 ug/ml), K. oxytoca (IC50 13.1 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (IC50 32.7 ug/ml), C. albicans (IC50 81.7 ug/ml), and C. neoformans (IC50 35.9 ug/ml).  IC50: 50% inhibition.UniProt P81468: you can view AlphaFold predicted structure. Updated 7/2021; 11/2024
Literature Information.Author: Mak P., Wojcik K., Thogersen IB., Dubin A.1996
Literature Information.Title: Isolation, antimicrobial activities, and primary structures of hamster neutrophil defensins.
